sen.j: 旧居留地（きゅうきょりゅうち）とは、主に安政五カ国条約によってできた外国人の治外法権の区画をさす。
sen.e: The Former Foreign Settlement is the section of exterritoriality for a foreigner built mainly based on the Ansei Five-Power Treaties.
The Former Foreign Settlement is the section of exterritoriality for foreigners built mainly based on the Ansei Five-Power Treaties.
sen.cmt: a foreigner=> foreignersに修正しました。
sen.e: The Former Foreign Settlement is the section of exterritoriality for foreigners built mainly based on the Ansei Five-Power Treaties.

sen.j: 兵庫県神戸市と神奈川県横浜市、長崎県長崎市、大阪府大阪市の旧居留地が有名。
sen.e: The Former Foreign Settlement in Yokohama City Kanagawa Prefecture, Kobe City Hyogo Prefecture, Nagasaki City, Nagasaki Provvince and Osaka City Osaka Prefecture are famous.
The Former Foreign Settlements in Yokohama City Kanagawa Prefecture, in Kobe City Hyogo Prefecture, in Nagasaki City, Nagasaki Prefecture and Osaka City Osaka Prefecture are famous.
sen.cmt: settlementを複数形にしました。地名の前にすべてinをつけました。Provvence(スペルミスも有り）をprefectureに修正しました。
sen.e: The Former Foreign Settlements in Yokohama City Kanagawa Prefecture, in Kobe City Hyogo Prefecture, in Nagasaki City, Nagasaki Prefecture and Osaka City Osaka Prefecture are famous.

sen.j: 詳細は、「関内」の項目を参照のこと。
sen.e: For the further information, see the section of 'Kannai'.
For the further information, see the section of 'Kannai'.
For the further information, see the section of 'Kannai'.

sen.j: 詳細は、「旧川口居留地」の項目を参照のこと。
sen.e: For the further information, see the section of 'The Former Kawaguchi Foreign Settlement'.
For the further information, see the section of 'The Former Kawaguchi Foreign Settlement'.
For the further information, see the section of 'The Former Kawaguchi Foreign Settlement'.

sen.j: 神戸の旧居留地は、北は西国街道、東は旧生田川(現在のフラワーロード)、西は鯉川筋(現在の鯉川筋)、南は神戸港に囲まれた周囲と隔絶されていた地区で、そこにイギリス人技師J.W.ハートが居留地の設計を行い、整然とした西洋の街を造り上げた。
sen.e: The Former Foreign Settlement in Kobe was built on the isolated area, surrounded by Saigoku-kaido Road on the north, former Ikuta-gawa River (now Flower Road) on the east, Koikawasuji Road (now Koikawasuji Road) on the west, Port of Kobe on the south, designed by English engineer J.W.hart, who built neat western town on it.

The Former Foreign Settlement in Kobe was built on the isolated area, surrounded by Saigoku-kaido Road on the north, former Ikuta-gawa River (now Flower Road) on the east, Koikawasuji Road (now Koikawasuji Road) on the west, Port of Kobe on the south, designed by English engineer J.W.HART, who built neat western town on it.
sen.cmt: 名前を大文字にしました。
sen.e: The Former Foreign Settlement in Kobe was built on the isolated area, surrounded by Saigoku-kaido Road on the north, former Ikuta-gawa River (now Flower Road) on the east, Koikawasuji Road (now Koikawasuji Road) on the west, Port of Kobe on the south, designed by English engineer J.W.HART, who built neat western town on it.

sen.j: その後、東西の川は道路となったが、現在も道路を越えると街の雰囲気が一変する。
sen.e: The atmosphere of the town changes once you cross the road still now, though the rivers on the east and west turned into the roads later.
The atmosphere of the town changes once you cross the road still now, though the rivers on the east and west turned into the roads later.
The atmosphere of the town changes once you cross the road still now, though the rivers on the east and west turned into the roads later.

sen.j: 明治時代～昭和初期築の主な西洋館・近代建築は日没から22時頃までライトアップされる。
sen.e: The major Western-style buildings and modern architectures built in between Meiji Period and Early Showa era are illuminated from sundown till around 22 o'clock.
The major Western-style buildings and modern architectures built in between Meiji Period and Early Showa era are illuminated from sundown till around 10 p.m.
The major Western-style buildings and modern architectures built in between Meiji Period and Early Showa era are illuminated from sundown till around 10 p.m.

sen.j: また、仲町通と東遊園地で毎年12月に神戸ルミナリエが開催される。
sen.e: And Kobe Luminarie is taken place on Nakamachi-dori Street and Higashi-yuenchi Park every year in December.
And Kobe Luminarie is taken place on Nakamachi-dori Street and Higashi-yuenchi Park every year in December.
And Kobe Luminarie is taken place on Nakamachi-dori Street and Higashi-yuenchi Park every year in December.

sen.j: 1868年（明治元年）から1899年（明治32年）の返還までに、外国人に126区画に分けて競売された治外法権の場所であった。
sen.e: It was the place of exterritoriality divided into 126 sections, having been auctioned for foreigners since 1868 to their return in 1899.
It was the place of exterritoriality divided into 126 sections, having been auctioned for foreigners since 1868 to their return in 1899.
It was the place of exterritoriality divided into 126 sections, having been auctioned for foreigners since 1868 to their return in 1899.

sen.j: やがて、居留地の外国人が山手に住居を構えるようになったのが、北野町山本通である。
sen.e: Kitano-cho City Yamamoto-dori Street is where foreigners who had lived in The Former Foreign Settlement came to set up their house in Yamate later.
Kitano-cho City Yamamoto-dori Street is where foreigners who had lived in The Former Foreign Settlement set up house in Yamate (the mountain side) later.
sen.cmt: Yamateに説明を入れました。Came toを追記しました。Their houseに変更しました。
sen.e: Kitano-cho City Yamamoto-dori Street is where foreigners who had lived in The Former Foreign Settlement set up house in Yamate (the mountain side) later.

sen.j: 当時、条約の未締結国であった清国から神戸に渡ってきた華僑は、居留地には住むことができず、その西側に多く住み着き、南京町 (神戸)といった中華街を築いていった。
sen.e: Chinese abroad who came to Kobe from Qing with which Japan had not signed a treaty at that time, were not allowed to live in The Former Foreign Settlement,settling on its west side, building Chinatowns such as Nanjing-machi Town (Kobe).

Chinese abroad who came to Kobe from Qing with which Japan had not signed a treaty at that time, were not allowed to live in The Former Foreign Settlement, settling on its west side, building Chinatowns called Nanjing-machi Town (Kobe).
sen.cmt: settlingの前にスペースを入れました。Such as=>calledに修正しました。
sen.e: Chinese abroad who came to Kobe from Qing with which Japan had not signed a treaty at that time, were not allowed to live in The Former Foreign Settlement, settling on its west side, building Chinatowns called Nanjing-machi Town (Kobe).

sen.j: 居留地に対してこれら西側のエリアを雑居地といった。
sen.e: These western sections were called Mixed Residential Area to The Former Foreign Settlement
These western sections were called Mixed Residential Area to The Former Foreign Settlement.
sen.cmt: ピリオド追記しました。
sen.e: These western sections were called Mixed Residential Area to The Former Foreign Settlement.

sen.j: 1980年代までは、「老朽化した古いビルのオフィス街」という認識であったが、1988年に起こった旧神戸商工会議所ビルの保存運動が街再生のきっかけとなる。
sen.e: The perceptions of The Former Foreign Settlement was 'Business district of decrepit old buildings' until 1980, however, the preservation movement of Former Kobe Chamber of Commerce and Industry Building occurred in 1988 triggered the revitalization of the town.

The perceptions of The Former Foreign Settlement was 'Business district of decrepit old buildings' until 1980, however, the preservation movement of Former Kobe Chamber of Commerce and Industry Building occurred in 1988 triggered the revitalization of the town.

The perceptions of The Former Foreign Settlement was 'Business district of decrepit old buildings' until 1980, however, the preservation movement of Former Kobe Chamber of Commerce and Industry Building occurred in 1988 triggered the revitalization of the town.

sen.j: 商工会議所ビル自体は解体されたが、居留地の一角を占める百貨店大丸神戸店が自ら所有していたウィリアム・メレル・ヴォーリズ設計の近代建築をLive Lab West（現旧居留地38番館）として店舗化し、さらに周辺の近代西洋建築へ高級ブティックを積極的に出店していった。
sen.e: A department store Daimaru Kobe, which was in The Foreign Settlement,made the modern architecture it owned designed by William Merrell Vories into the shop Live Lab West (now The Former Foreign Settlement 38th Building), opening up luxury boutiques aggressively in modern western architectures nearby, though Chamber of Commerce and Industry Building itself had been torn down.

A department store Daimaru Kobe, which was in The Foreign Settlement, made the modern architecture it owned designed by William Merrell Vories into the shop as Live Lab West (now The Former Foreign Settlement 38th Building), opening up luxury boutiques aggressively in modern western architectures nearby, though Chamber of Commerce and Industry Building itself had been torn down.
sen.cmt: madeの前にスペースを入れました。Live Lab West の前にasを入れました。
sen.e: A department store Daimaru Kobe, which was in The Foreign Settlement, made the modern architecture it owned designed by William Merrell Vories into the shop as Live Lab West (now The Former Foreign Settlement 38th Building), opening up luxury boutiques aggressively in modern western architectures nearby, though Chamber of Commerce and Industry Building itself had been torn down.

sen.j: それによって近代建築オーナーの意識も変わり、近代建築が点在するのではなく「街並み」として「面」として存在することの価値を認識するようになる。
sen.e: Which changed the attitude of owners of modern architectures, making them aware that modern architectures are not dotting but existing as 'town' or 'area'.
It changed the attitude of owners of modern architectures, making them aware that modern architectures are not dotting but existing as 'town' or 'area'.
It changed the attitude of owners of modern architectures, making them aware that modern architectures are not dotting but existing as 'town' or 'area'.

sen.j: 2000年代に入るとLVMHなどの外資ブランドが直接参入し、今では「最も神戸らしい洗練された街」として活況を呈するようになった。
sen.e: In 2000s, foreign brands such as LVMH joined directly, and now it is thriving as 'the town stylish and most Kobe-like '.
In 2000s, foreign brands such as LVMH joined directly, and now it is thriving as 'the town stylish and most Kobe-like '.
In 2000s, foreign brands such as LVMH joined directly, and now it is thriving as 'the town stylish and most Kobe-like '.

sen.j: これは市民運動と商業資本のコラボレーションの成功例として特記に値する。
sen.e: It is particularly notable as the successful example of the collaboration between civic movement and commercial capital.
It is particularly notable as the successful example of the collaboration between civic movement and commercial capital.
It is particularly notable as the successful example of the collaboration between civic movement and commercial capital.

sen.j: 1992年に国土交通省の都市景観100選に選定、2007年には旧居留地連絡協議会が日本都市計画学会の最高賞である日本都市計画学会石川賞を受賞している。
sen.e: It was selected as The 100 City Landscape by Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism in 1992, and Association of The Former Foreign Settlement was awarded with Ishikawa Award of City Planning Institute of Japan, which was the top prize, in 2007.
sen.cmt: 旧居留地連絡協議会(定訳不明です。）
sen.e: It was selected as the 100 City Landscape by Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism in 1992, and Association of The Former Foreign Settlement was awarded with Ishikawa Award of City Planning Institute of Japan, which was the top prize, in 2007.

It was selected as the 100 City Landscape by Ministry of Land, Infrastructure, Transport and Tourism in 1992, and Association of The Former Foreign Settlement was awarded with Ishikawa Award of City Planning Institute of Japan, which was the top prize, in 2007.
